All Classes

Class Description
Apollo
Class used to describe Apollo Card to the client
Arthemis
Class used to describe Arthemis Card to the client
Athena
Class used to describe Athena Card to the client
AthenaConditionException
Exception thrown when Athena Condition isn't satisfied
Atlas
Class used to describe Atlas Card to the client
Box
Abstract class Box used to manage the client's view.
Box
Class Box that represents a box in the game map
BoxCLI
Class used to represent a map's box for the client
BoxSelectedEvent
Event that communicates the selection of a box by the client
CardSelectedEvent
Event that communicate the selection of a card by the client
CardSelectionEvent
Event that confirms to the client which card he chose
ClientConnection
Abstract class that represents a connection to the server (client-side)
ClientNotFoundException  
CommunicationEvent
Event that communicates a generic message to the client
ConnectionRequest
Message sent from the client to the server to request connection
Controller
Class Controller is assigned to a VirtualView and to a Model (GAME), it helps the server in performing the actions needed to play a Santorini Game.
Demeter
Class used to describe Demeter Card to the client
Divinity
Class used to describe a generic Divinity Card to the client
Event
Abstract class Event that provides the method manage(), used to manage the forwarding of events, it is extended by MVEvent and VCEvent.
EventSender
Interface representing the generic event sender, extended by VCEvent senders and MVEvent senders.
Game
Class Game that represents the game model
GameUpdatingEvent
Event that sends to the client the updated version of the current game
GodCardsSelectedEvent
Event that communicates to the client the chosen cards
GodsSelectedEvent
Event that communicates the selection of the game cards by the client
Hephaestus
Class used to describe Hephaestus Card to the client
InputFailedException
Exception thrown when some methods are used with an invalid input
InvalidBoxException
Exception thrown when the selected box isn't valid
InvalidConstructionEvent
Event that communicates to the client that its construction wasn't valid
InvalidConstructionException
Exception thrown when construction performed isn't valid
InvalidIndicesException
Exception thrown when the selected indices aren't valid
InvalidInputEvent
Event that communicates to the client that its input wasn't valid
InvalidInputException
Exception thrown when the selected input isn't valid
InvalidMovementEvent
Event that communicates to the client that its movement wasn't valid
InvalidMovementException
Exception thrown when the movement performed isn't valid
InvalidSenderException  
JsonHelper
Class that provides methods to serialize and deserialize events sent and received throughout our MVC architecture
LoserPlayerEvent
Event that communicates to the client that he lost
Map
Abstract class Map used to manage the client's view.
Map
Class Map is the class used to represent the Santorini's map
MapCLI
Class used to represent the game's map for the client
Message
Class used to represent a generic message sent throughout our network
Minotaur
Class used to describe Minotaur Card to the client
MVEvent
Abstract Class MVEvent that represents the generic event sent from the server to the client
MVEventSender
Interface representing the generic MVEvent sender.
MVPingEvent
Event used to check the connection
NetworkHandler
Class that handles the client's communications with the server.
NotValidBoxException
Exception thrown when the selected box isn't valid
NotValidLevelException
Exception thrown when the selected level isn't valid
NotValidPlayersException
Exception thrown when the selected players aren't valid
NotValidWorkersException
Exception thrown when the selected workers aren't valid
NumPlayersSelectedEvent
Event that communicates the selection of the game settings (number of players) by the client
Pair  
Pan
Class used to describe Pan Card to the client
Player
The class Player represents a Santorini's player, it has a playerID that uniquely identifies him/her.
Player2  
PlayerApollo
The class PlayerApollo represents a player using Apollo as god
PlayerArthemis
The class PlayerArthemis represents a player using Arthemis as god
PlayerAthena
The class PlayerAthena represents a player using Athena as god
PlayerAtlas
The class PlayerAtlas represents a player using Atlas as god
PlayerColor
Enum Class to distinguish the players in different teams depending on their color
PlayerDataEnteredEvent
Event that communicates the selection of a player's data by the client
PlayerDemeter
The class PlayerDemeter represents a player using Demeter as god
PlayerDivinity
Abstract subclass of Player, used to play games with Divinity Cards
PlayerHephaestus
The class PlayerHephaestus represents a player using Hephaestus as god
PlayerInterface
Class used to manage the user experience during the game.
PlayerJoinedEvent
Event that communicates to the client its data when he/her joins the game
PlayerMinotaur
The class PlayerMinotaur represents a player using Minotaur as god
PlayerNotAthena
The class PlayerNotAthena represents a generic player playing against someone with Athena's card
PlayerNotValidException
Exception thrown when the selected player isn't valid
PlayerPan
The class PlayerPan represents a player using Pan as god
PlayerPrometheus
The class PlayerPrometheus represents a player using Prometheus as god
Prometheus
Class used to describe Prometheus Card to the client
PrometheusMovementException
Exception thrown when the Prometheus movement performed isn't valid
RestartConfirmationEvent
Event that communicates the decision of restarting selected by the client
Server
Class Server used to perform an entire game of Santorini with clients connected to the server
ServerConnection
Interface that represents the server to be implemented in our network
SocketConnection
Class used to implement the client's connection to the server
SocketConnection  
SocketServer  
StarterSelectedEvent
Event that communicates the selection of the starter by the client
StarterSelectionEvent
Event that communicates to the client who is the starter
UseofSpecialPowerEvent
Event that communicates the selection of the special power by the client
VCEvent
Abstract Class VCEvent that represents the generic event sent from the client to the server
VCEventSender
Interface representing the generic VCEvent sender.
VCPingEvent
Event used to check the connection
VirtualView
Class VirtualView that sends MVEvents to the Client, and receives VCEvent from the Network Handler.
WinnerPlayerEvent
Event that communicates to the client that he won
WithGodsSelectedEvent
Event that communicates the selection of game settings (Use of cards or not) by the client
Worker
Class Worker used to represent one Santorini's worker belonging to a player
WorkerNotExistException
Exception thrown when the selected worker doesn't exist
WorkerSelectedEvent
Event that communicates the selection of a worker by the client
WrongConstructionException
Exception thrown when the construction performed isn't valid
WrongMovementException
Exception thrown when the movement performed isn't valid
WrongPlayers_WorkersException
Exception thrown when the worker-player assignment isn't valid
